definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Pharmacologist is seriously studying the hypersusceptibility reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: Anaphylaxis, as discussed earlier in the week, may also present with bronchoconstriction.
sentences.chinese: 如前讨论所述，过敏反应也可出现支气管收缩。

sentences.english: Eosinophils can increase with allergic reactions and with parasitic infestations.
sentences.chinese: 当过敏反应和寄生虫感染时嗜酸性粒细胞会增多。

sentences.english: Has had a severe allergic reaction to the antibiotic neomycin.
sentences.chinese: 对抗生素新霉素有严重过敏反应的。

sentences.english: Pharmacologists are carefully studying the allergic reaction of the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: Epinephrine is critical to rapidly improve the course of anaphylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素能够快速紧急改善速发型过敏反应过程。

sentences.english: But for allergic reaction, skin test must be done before using.
sentences.chinese: 由于易出现过敏反应，使用前必须做皮内试验。

sentences.english: Pharmacologists is studying up on allergic reaction of this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: The pharmacologists are studying earnestly the sensitive feedback of this medical.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: The pharmacologists are making a careful  study of the allergy of the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: The occurrence of an allergic reaction has nothing to do with the drug dose-dependent .
sentences.chinese: 过敏反应的发生与药物剂量大小无关。

sentences.english: The pharmacologist is studying up to the allergy of the medichine.
sentences.chinese: 药理学家们正在认真研究这种药的过敏反应。

sentences.english: One of the ways to control the allergic reactions is with an antihistamine.
sentences.chinese: 的方法来控制过敏反应，其一是一种抗组胺剂。

sentences.english: A diagnosis of anaphylaxis and angina pectoris was made.
sentences.chinese: 过敏反应和心绞痛的诊断被确立。

sentences.english: During desensitization, allergic-type reactions occurred in 4 patients and angina occurred in 1 patient.
sentences.chinese: 在试验中，4个出现过敏反应，1人出现心绞痛。

sentences.english: Guineapigs skin didnt appear allergic reaction.
sentences.chinese: 豚鼠皮肤未见过敏反应。

definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
